subject: Re: Drivers to use Unicode
msgSnippet: ... There are Mac keyboards for Unicode in several languages. The one that comes with Macs, primarily for Chinese, can be used to input any Unicode as long as
messageBody:
Since the encoding is quite new, I think there aren't keybaord drivers for 
any system yet. What's your operating system? Windows? Unix (including 
Linux)? Mac OS? Which version?

There are Mac keyboards for Unicode in several languages. The one that comes with Macs, primarily for Chinese, can be used to input any Unicode as long as you have the font & know the code numbers.
AFAIK…
